text: Faisal Aziz (born 1957) is an Iraqi former footballer who played as a midfielder or forward. He represented the Iraq national team in the 1982 Asian Games. Faisal played for the national team between 1980 and 1981. He made his international debut against Poland in 1980. In 1981, he helped Iraq win the Pestabola Merdeka. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Al-Shorta SC players Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Al-Shorta SC managers Category:Footballers at the 1982 Asian Games
title: Faisal Aziz
